H0.text: Irrigation is the process through which organisms contribute to the water cycle.

H1.text: Evaporation is the process through which organisms contribute to the water cycle.

H2.text: Precipitation is the process through which organisms contribute to the water cycle.

H3.text: Transpiration is the process through which organisms mainly contribute to the water cycle.

A4.text: Transpiration is the process of water movement through a plant and its evaporation from aerial parts, such as leaves, stems and flowers.

A5.text: Transpiration is the larger component of evapotranspiration.
